title: TIBCO Spotfire 7 Named a 2015 Trend-Setting Product by KMWorld Magazine
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: TIBCO Software Inc. 
PALO ALTO, CA -- (Marketwired) -- 09/03/15 -- TIBCO Software Inc. , a global leader in integration, analytics, and event processing, today announced that KMWorld Magazine has named TIBCO Spotfire® 7 a 2015 Trend-Setting Product. Released in February 2015, Spotfire® 7 is a powerful yet simple-to-use analytics and data visualization platform, relied on by enterprises large and small around the world. 
With a beautiful design, Spotfire 7 provides easy-to-use analytics, enabling users of all skill levels to gain insights faster and easier than ever before. Leveraging built-in "smart" analytics, even beginners can instantly start analyzing data with the TIBCO Spotfire® Recommendations feature, a radically simple way to create eye-catching visualizations and dashboards. Additional streamlined features accelerate the data-exploration experience, and users have the flexibility to customize the look and feel of their dashboards to match applications or style guidelines. 
KMWorld's annual Trend-Setting Products list, now in its 13th year, is compiled through close collaboration among judges consisting of the industry's leading analysts, practitioners, theorists, and knowledge workers. All judges agree the market should be ready to embrace these solutions. 
"Being recognized as a trend-setting product is validation that Spotfire is making analytics faster and easier for experts as well as novice users," said Mike Boyarski, director, product marketing, TIBCO Analytics. "With a streamlined design that's powered by our patented intelligent analytics engine, we're happy to be recognized and confident that Spotfire will continue to be an industry-leading analytics and data visualization platform." 
Speaking on behalf of the judging panel KMWorld Editor-in-Chief Hugh McKellar says, "In each and every case, the thoughtfulness and elegance of the software certainly warrants deep examination. Depending on customer needs, the products on the list can dramatically boost organizational performance." 
McKellar adds, "The panel, which consists of editorial colleagues, market and technology analysts, KM theoreticians, practitioners, customers, and a select few savvy users (in a variety of disciplines), reviewed more than 200 vendors, whose combined product lineups include more than 1,000 separate offerings. The products identified fulfill the ultimate goal of knowledge management -- delivering the right information to the right people at the right time." 
For more information read the September issue of KMWorld Magazine, or to register for a free trial of Spotfire 7 please visit spotfire.tibco.com/trial . 
About TIBCO TIBCO Software empowers executives, developers, and business users with Fast Data solutions that make the right data available in real time for faster answers, better decisions, and smarter action. Over the past 15 years, thousands of businesses across the globe have relied on TIBCO technology to integrate their applications and ecosystems, analyze their data, and create real-time solutions. Learn how TIBCO turns data -- big or small -- into differentiation at www.tibco.com.
